query:
SELECT 'doctors' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM doctors
UNION ALL
SELECT 'hospitals', COUNT(*) FROM hospitals
UNION ALL
SELECT 'specialties', COUNT(*) FROM specialties
UNION ALL
SELECT 'loyaltyTiers', COUNT(*) FROM loyaltyTiers
UNION ALL
SELECT 'rewards', COUNT(*) FROM rewards
UNION ALL
SELECT 'doctorSchedules', COUNT(*) FROM doctorSchedules;
